text: Kim Kardashian has had her share of haters over her 10 years of fame. And on Thursday the siren, 37, offered some advice to her fans on how to deal with it as she took to her site kimkardashianwest. com. In a post titled How I Deal with Haters, she said,'If you let people bring you down, it â€™ s harder to focus on your goals. Just do you and don't give in to the negativity.'Staying tough : Kim Kardashian offered some advice to her fans on how to deal with haters ; here she is seen in a photo shared on Thursday with Khloe and Kourtney That same day she shared an image from Tokyo with sisters Kourtney, 38, and Khloe
